snippet: A vessel of timber and lore was hammered by the hurricane, and the captain has not been found.
abstract: HMS Bounty, vessel of timber rigged to evoke the famous 18th-century ship, founders 90 miles southeast of Cape Hatteras, NC, in Hurricane Sandy; fourteen of 15 crew members are rescued from the tall ship celebrity, but the captain remains missing.
lead_paragraph: A vessel of timber and lore was hammered by the hurricane, and the captain has not been found.

headline.seo: Evoking 18th-Century Drama, Bounty Finds Storm Tragedy
headline.main: Evoking 18th-Century Drama, a Tragedy on the Bounty
headline.print_headline: Evoking 18th-Century Drama, a Tragedy on the Bounty
